idinfo.useconst: This work is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 License .

descript.abstract: Dataset represents presence of bat species as determined from acousticmonitoring. Detectors were deployed at sites within National Forests according to A Plan for the North American Bat Monitoring Program (NABat) guidelines.Acoustic data were screened and analyzed by Christen Long, Bat Conservation International. Data were analyzed to determine species present per night. Map symbols represent detector locations. For more information at each site, click the info tab, and then draw a box around your area of interest.

citeinfo.title: US Forest Service NABat Stationary Detectors 2020
